title: What are some events that only occur once every two years? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are a few examples of biennial events: Sporting events such as the World Taekwondo Championships. Technically the Olympics are now a biennial event too, even though they switch between Summer & Winter games.Many national and international conferences, meetings and conventions are biennial. The European Society of Immunodeficiencies Meeting, the Biennial Conference on Chemical Education, and the American Association of University Women National Convention are a few examples.There are many plants that follow a biennial life cycle. This means that they bloom once every two years instead of every year.Here's decent list of some other biennial events including competitions, festivals, and other activities.
